text: {{Infobox Pro hockey team | current = 2013–14 AIK IF season | text_color = #FFEE00 | bg_color = #000000 | team = AIK | logo = | logosize = 180px | city = Solna Municipality, Sweden | league = Allsvenskan | conference = | division = | founded = 1921 | arena = Hovet, Stockholm | uniform = | colors = Black, yellow | owner = | GM = Anders Gozzi | coach = Rikard Franzén | captain = Patric Blomdahl | name1 = AIK | dates1 = 1921–1923 | name2 = AIK | dates2 = 1925–present | le_mat_trophies = 1934, 1935, 1938, 1946, 1947, 1982, 1984 }} AIF IF is the ice hockey section of sports club Allmänna Idrottsklubben in the town of Solna Municipality in Sweden. The section was started in 1921 and won the Swedish national championship in the years of 1934, 1935, 1938, 1946, 1947, 1982 and 1984. They also lost the Swedish national finals in the years of 1930, 1936, 1949, 1978 and 1981. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:1921 establishments in Sweden Category:Ice hockey teams in Sweden
title: AIK IF
